result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for loading HCL configuration files directly into Go struct values and testing the decoding functionality.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating functionality related to HCL file decoding and its corresponding tests.

hclsimple/hclsimple.go.purpose: This file provides functions to load HCL configuration files directly into Go struct values.
side_effects: Reads files from the filesystem in DecodeFile

hclsimple/hclsimple_test.go.purpose: This file contains tests for decoding HCL and JSON configurations using the hclsimple package.
side_effects: Logs fatal errors if configuration loading fails.
